name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren!"
I run to Ren and scoop him up in my arms.
I understand now why he's not in human form.
When Ren bit me and his memories poured in, it all fell into place. I also understand why Ren and I share so many memories.
The Allmate I'm holding in my arms... This is just Ren's vessel.
Ren―the true Ren―isn't an Allmate. His mind, his soul, has been with me forever, has seen and felt all the same things I have...
And now... that Ren is inside me again.
Back when I was just a little kid, I used to talk to someone inside my head.
At some point, as I got older, I stopped and gradually forgot.
But now, it's all come back to me. That voice inside my head... was Ren.
Ren is inside me now, just like he always has been.
The Allmate Ren was like a puppet the Ren inside me was controlling, or maybe even the... personification of that personality, somehow.
I don't know how the Ren personality controlled the Allmate, or why.
But Ren's mind isn't inside the Allmate anymore.
He's inside me now.
Inside my mind.
I can hardly believe it... but I know it's true.
I want to see Ren. Talk to him. But I can't do it like this.
Ren has abandoned his Allmate shell and hidden himself away inside me.
Which means...
Part of Rhyme's appeal is that it connects participants' minds directly. On the public field, you do battle with a projection of your opponent's psyche.
In other words, it should be possible to use Rhyme to access someone else's mind.
Which means I only have one option available.
Of course, I've never done this before, and failing won't come without risks. There's probably a pretty high chance of failure, too.
But I can't think of anything else.
My only hope...
...is to use Scrap on myself.
